Translations.Text: Ta shuo:“Guanyu tamen de zhishi, zai wo de zhu nali jilu zai yi ben shu zhong. Wo de zhu, ji bu cuowu, you bu shuhu.”
Ta wei nimen yi dadi wei yaolan, ta wei nimen zai dadishang kaipi xuduo daolu, ta cong tianshang jiangxia yushui, er jie yushui shengchan ge zhong zhiwu
Nimen keyi chi naxie zhiwu, keyi fangmu nimen de shengchu. Duiyu you lizhi zhe, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang
Wo cong dadi chuangzaole nimen, wo shi nimen fu fan yu dadi, wo zai yici shi nimen cong da di fuhuo
Wo que yi zhishi ta wo suoyou de yi qie jixiang, er ta jiayi fouren, bu ken xindao
Ta shuo:“Mu sa a! Ni dao women zheli lai, xiang jie ni de moshu ba women zhu chu guojing ma
Women biding zai ni mianqian biaoyan tongyang de moshu. Ni zai yige huxiang shangliang di difang, zai women he ni zhi jian, ding yige yue qi, women he ni, dajia dou bu shuangyue.”
Ta shuo: Nimen de yue qi ding zai jieri, dang zhongren zai zaochen jihe de shihou
Falao jiu zhuan huiqu, zhaoji ta de mouchen, ranhou ta laile
Mu sa dui tamen shuo:“Nimen zhen gaisi, nimen buyao wumie an la, yimian ta yong xingfa huimie nimen; wumie an la zhe, que yi shibaile.”
Tamen wei zhe jian shi, yilun fenfen, bingqie yinni tamen de yilun
tamen shuo:“Zhe liang ge que shi liang ge shushi, xiang yong moshu ba nimen zhu chu guojing, bingqie feichu nimen de zui wanshan de zhidu
suoyi, nimen yingdang jueding nimen de jice, ranhou jie dui er lai; jintian zhan shangfeng de, biding chenggong.”
